title: heres an idea
body: So Riot, i think that for the 4th of July, you guys should create and Bald Eagle Swain skin.  He does still hold his cane just for the sole fact that hes crippled.  But hi outfit should be red wite and blue, and when he ults, he should turn into a giant bald eagle.  What do you guys think of the idea?

replies.body: There's also an Uncle Ryze skin too...
